omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		PatientAddressStructured1,
		PatientAddressStructured2,
		PatientAddressStructured3,
		PatientAddressStructured4,
		PatientAddressStructured5,
		Postcode,
		NHSNumber
from omop_staging.cds_line01
where PatientAddressType = '02'
	and
	(
		PatientAddressStructured1 is not null or
		PatientAddressStructured2 is not null or
		PatientAddressStructured3 is not null or
		PatientAddressStructured4 is not null or
		PatientAddressStructured5 is not null or
		Postcode is not null
	);

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.operation_description: Separates text with newlines. Trim whitespace.

dataSource.name: PatientAddressStructured1
dataSource.description: The first line of the address.
